The best competitive shooter there is on the market. Easy to learn, I'd say hard to master, but the amount of community support the game has is incredible; from Aim Training and utility-teaching maps to guides on how to modify your crosshair and hud. The timeless hours you spend working is all worth it when you rank up, whether that's matchmaking, faceit or ESEA.
Best competative game I've ever played.

Good game to play with friends. Really helps out with aim, skills transfer over to other fps games.
